item.title: The Garden Flower Challenge
item.description: Table Of Contents 🔥 Motivation 🔩 Set-Up Install libraries Import Libraries Utilities Functions Split Dataset into class Balanced sub-sets Selecting the Run-Device Adding Augmentation Creating the Pytorch DataLoader Creating the Learner and Adding CutMix Running the Learner 🔎 Reality Check Plotting ROC Curve Plotting Confusion Matrix Plotting the Top Losses 🧭 Conclusion 🙏 Comments & Feedback Follow me 👇 🔥 Motivation Link to heading This is a quite common “take home” challenge.
